channel.title: Template Tor Browser / Minimal Whonix Template / Build Whonix
channel.description:
Hello, I have a problem.
I use for one template for one program, but, I have a problem with whonix minimalization, I don't need all of the programs that are preinstalled in the whonix template, as I use them separately in the minimal templates. I only need the tor browser
When I try to remove all the programs I don't need from the whonix template, I encounter a bunch of errors.
Can you tell me what I can do to create a minimal template for my tor browser
Maybe I can modify debian template to whonix and then make settings of tor browser like whonix?
Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)

item.title: Template Tor Browser / Minimal Whonix Template / Build Whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
There is no minimal Whonix template.

melodeedgy:

When I try to remove all the programs I don’t need from the whonix template, I encounter a bunch of errors.

See:

Whonix – 20 Apr 22

Debian Packages

Which Whonix ™ Debian packages are safe to remove? What is a meta package? What other packages do Whonix ™ meta packages install? Which packages should never be removed?

Read full topic
item.source: Template Tor Browser / Minimal Whonix Template / Build Whonix
